records.Name: Corporate Attorney
records.Description__c: Tech Innovators Legal is looking for a skilled Corporate Attorney to handle all legal aspects of our business. The candidate will oversee compliance, negotiate deals, and handle legal disputes. Experience in technology law is preferred.

records.Name: Paralegal Specialist
records.Description__c: Creative Law Solutions is seeking an experienced Paralegal Specialist to support our legal team. The role involves legal research, drafting documents, and assisting attorneys in case preparation. Strong organizational skills and attention to detail are a must.
